00168 #ifdef ICC_BYTE_ORDER_LITTLE_ENDIAN
00169 inline void icSwab16Ptr(void *pVoid)
00170 {
00171   icUInt8Number *ptr = (icUInt8Number*)pVoid;
00172   icUInt8Number tmp;
00173 
00174   tmp = ptr[0]; ptr[0] = ptr[1]; ptr[1] = tmp;
00175 }
00176 
00177 inline void icSwab16Array(void *pVoid, int num)
00178 {
00179   icUInt8Number *ptr = (icUInt8Number*)pVoid;
00180   icUInt8Number tmp;
00181 
00182   while (num>0) {
00183     tmp = ptr[0]; ptr[0] = ptr[1]; ptr[1] = tmp;
00184     ptr += 2;
00185     num--;
00186   }
00187 }
00188 
00189 inline void icSwab32Ptr(void *pVoid)
00190 {
00191   icUInt8Number *ptr = (icUInt8Number*)pVoid;
00192   icUInt8Number tmp;
00193 
00194   tmp = ptr[0]; ptr[0] = ptr[3]; ptr[3] = tmp;
00195   tmp = ptr[1]; ptr[1] = ptr[2]; ptr[2] = tmp;
00196 }
00197 
00198 inline void icSwab32Array(void *pVoid, int num)
00199 {
00200   icUInt8Number *ptr = (icUInt8Number*)pVoid;
00201   icUInt8Number tmp;
00202 
00203   while (num>0) {
00204     tmp = ptr[0]; ptr[0] = ptr[3]; ptr[3] = tmp;
00205     tmp = ptr[1]; ptr[1] = ptr[2]; ptr[2] = tmp;
00206     ptr += 4;
00207     num--;
00208   }
00209 
00210 }
00211 
00212 inline void icSwab64Ptr(void *pVoid)
00213 {
00214   icUInt8Number *ptr = (icUInt8Number*)pVoid;
00215   icUInt8Number tmp;
00216 
00217   tmp = ptr[0]; ptr[0] = ptr[7]; ptr[7] = tmp;
00218   tmp = ptr[1]; ptr[1] = ptr[6]; ptr[6] = tmp;
00219   tmp = ptr[2]; ptr[2] = ptr[5]; ptr[5] = tmp;
00220   tmp = ptr[3]; ptr[3] = ptr[4]; ptr[4] = tmp;
00221 }
00222 
00223 inline void icSwab64Array(void *pVoid, int num)
00224 {
00225   icUInt8Number *ptr = (icUInt8Number*)pVoid;
00226   icUInt8Number tmp;
00227 
00228   while (num>0) {
00229     tmp = ptr[0]; ptr[0] = ptr[7]; ptr[7] = tmp;
00230     tmp = ptr[1]; ptr[1] = ptr[6]; ptr[6] = tmp;
00231     tmp = ptr[2]; ptr[2] = ptr[5]; ptr[5] = tmp;
00232     tmp = ptr[3]; ptr[3] = ptr[4]; ptr[4] = tmp;
00233     ptr += 8;
00234     num--;
00235   }
00236 
00237 }
00238 #else 
00239 #define icSwab16Ptr(x)
00240 #define icSwab16Array(x, n)
00241 #define icSwab32Ptr(x)
00242 #define icSwab32Array(x, n)
00243 #define icSwab64Ptr(x)
00244 #define icSwab64Array(x, n)
00245 #endif
00246 
00247 #define icSwab16(x) icSwab16Ptr(&x)
00248 #define icSwab32(x) icSwab32Ptr(&x)
00249 #define icSwab64(x) icSwab64Ptr(&x)

00299
